headline: Solar stocks jump, casino names surge, Ford Q2 sales increase
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton covers the trading day's top stories in this segment of Market Minute. Solar stocks Sunrun (RUN), SolarEdge (SEDG), and Enphase (ENPH) climb as President Trump's tax and spending bill clears the Senate. Casino stocks, including Las Vegas Sands (LVS), Wynn Resorts (WYNN), and MGM Resorts (MGM), surge after Macau's June gaming revenue beats expectations. Ford (F) stock gains after the company reported a 14.2% increase in second quarter US sales, driven by strong demand for trucks, hybrids, and SUVs. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Sunrun, SolarEdge, and Other Solar Stocks Jump as Republicans Strip Excise Tax From Spending Bill
summary: Sunrun  surged 13%,  SolarEdge Technologies  rose 9.7%, and  Enphase Energy  was up 7.3%.  Shares of  First Solar  the largest solar manufacturer in the U.S., were up 1.5%, while  NextEra Energy  a leading provider of wind and solar power, gained 2.9%.
